hypothesis_content.title: Layer-2 Breakout Momentum After BTC Consolidation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC consolidates within a 2% range for 3 consecutive days in a NEUTRAL regime, leading Layer-2 tokens (ARB, OP, MATIC) will experience a momentum breakout with 5%+ outperformance against ETH over the next 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: BTC consolidation in neutral regimes often triggers capital rotation into high-beta altcoins. Layer-2 narratives are currently strong (STRK, ARB news), creating asymmetric upside potential when BTC volatility compresses.
entry_conditions: BTC daily close range <2% for 3 consecutive days
ARB/ETH or OP/ETH ratio breaks above 20-day Bollinger Band upper band
Layer-2 sector volume increases by 25%+ vs 7-day average

exit_conditions.take_profit: 8% gain on L2/ETH ratio from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 3% loss on L2/ETH ratio from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: L2 tokens fail to outperform ETH by >2% within 5 days despite BTC consolidation and volume surge.
